title.rendered: LUMIERE RUNWAY Fashion Show in Moroccan Royal Palace on February 12, 2022

content.rendered:
The event theme is Celebrating New York Fashion Week in the amazing Moroccan Royal Palace in West Hollywood.

Discover the beautiful designs and exquisite unique collection of our fashion Designers.

These stylish top fashion designers, combine with this beautiful Middle Eastern venue to create a timeless elegance.

The singer Shannon K joined our Management Team as Lumiere Runway Creative Director.

1510 N Stanley Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90046

Lumiere Runway is an eagerly awaited event that will present the latest collections of various established designers:

- High Status

- Alien Earth Designs

- Smock Me

- Verita Couture

- Jonathan Marc Stein

The Red Carpet starts at 3pm and the show begins at 4pm. In collaboration with local charity, Kaimore, they help underserved communities achieve stability through Personal Finance, Career Development & Building a Business.

5% of proceed from the event will be contributed to them.

We have the honor to team up again with Michael Vincent Academy for makeup & style.

Our Major Beverage Sponsors are Loft and Bear Vodka made in LA And Chapter 38 Wine (CBD Infused wine)

24 FASHION TV has been a media sponsor of major fashion shows all over the world, and they will be our Media Partner. We are honor to work again with them.

Lumiere Runway style is a mix of fashion and entertainment, with 3 artists performing at the event.

- Tori K

- Bona Vega

- Mac Glitzy

You can find event ticket information here https://www.eventbrite.com/e/lumiere-runway-fashion-show-royal-moroccan-palace- tickets-243246194917?aff=erelexpmlt

Organizer: MELER PRODUCTIONS is a complete event organizer and management firm that operates in Los Angeles, Hong Kong, and France.

We organize and manage projects to connect individuals, build communities and breed innovation. One of our many talents is to create spectacular product launches, unforgettable experiences. Meler productions is an international company with a modern and young vibe that will create a memorable experience for everyone. Contact: info@lumiererunway.com

Website & Social Media www.lumiererunway.com IG: @lumiere_runway YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCllngmooXD_fPtIIDt79EcA
